"Battle the Devil Castle":
"異世界オメガに存在する魔神城が活性化。
かの世界で戦乱が起こっています。
オメガへ向かい、魔神城を撃破しましょう。
魔神城の結界を突破するための兵器
「破界鎚」が鍵になる戦いですよ！
頑張りましょう、守護輝士！
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest ends when time limit expires.
When the enemy gauge hits 0 by the
end of the quest, you win."

"ルツの奸計も乗り越え
魔神城を撃破しながら王都へ迫る
ハリエット率いる革命軍。
クエントの未来を決する戦いが始まろうとしていた。"
"Battle the Cuent Castle"

"ルツの奸計も乗り越え
魔神城を撃破しながら王都へ迫る
ハリエット率いる革命軍。
クエントの未来を決する戦いが
始まろうとしていた。
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest ends when time limit expires.
When the enemy gauge hits 0 by the
end of the quest, you win."
"Defeat the Devil Castle!"

"You'll be fighting the Devil Castle
soon! Barriers have been verified to
erected, so expect a fierce fight!"

"As you near the Devil Caslte, summon
the Buster Pile and destroy the
barriers! With that, I wish you good luck!"

"The enemy forces are preparing to
attack! Collect enough Mana for any of the weapons set in place!"

"When you amass enough Mana, ARKS
weapons are strengthened and the
number of summoned spawns are increased!"

"Enemy assault force has been detected!
Gather as much Mana as possible while
protecting the tower!"

"The enemy army is preparing another
assault! As more Mana is collected,
our towers will recover automatically."

"The enemy has started its assault!
Recover more Mana while defending our
towers so it can start its recovery."

"This is terrible! The enemy assault
force has started to advance towards
our Buster Tower! Please stop what
you're doing and help defend it!"

"The enemy army has prepared another
assault! Although we broke through the
barrier, but if our tower is destroyed,
then we cannot grasp victory! Watch out!"

"A strong signal has been detected
from the Devil Castle! It seems to be
planning an attack on our Buster Tower!
Please stop it!"

"Another strong signal detected from
the Devil Castle...! Please defend our
towers from the Devil Castle's assault!"

"Summoned the Buster Pile!
Escort the payload from the enemy
army and break down their barriers!"

"Summoned the Buster Pile!
Protect the Buster Pile from enemy
attacks and destroy the remaining barriers!"

"We summoned the Buster Pile!
Let's break through the barriers!"

"We successfully destroyed all the
barriers! All there's left is to defeat
the Devil Castle! Let's attack the
core located on the abdomen!"

"The Devil Castle unleashes its assault
towards the Buster towers at regular
intervals! Please destroy the core as
soon as possible!"

"Move to the left or right stairs
that lead towards the center to
attack the Devil Castle!"

"The Devil Castle will begin its
laser assault at regular intervals!
Hurry and defeat it!"

"Scale its defense mechanism and
attack the Weak Point of the
Devil Castle!"

"The enemy assault has been suppressed!
We're summoning a Buster Pile.
Please prepare for the advancement!"
"We'll start the summon and attack the barriers! Collect Mana and let's increase the number of Piles!"

"Buster Pile summoned!
Please prepare your assault!"

"The Buster Pile has finished and
enemy reinforcements have arrived!
We predict the enemy will start to
target the Buster towers again, so
please defend it!"

"The Buster Pile has disappeared and
the enemy is sending another assault!
Protect the Buster towers!"

"The Buster Pile is destroyed and
once again, the enemy is sending
reinforcements! Protect the Buster towers!"

"The enemy army has changed its
strategy! Watch out! Some of them
appear to be kamikaze units!"

"The enemy forces are weakening!
Let's take them out!"

"There's only a few of them left!
Just a little more!"

"There's disturbing readings from the
Devil Castle! It seems it's going to
attack! Please watch yourselves!"

"We've collected more Mana.
You're able to summon more Busters!
Please continue to collect more Mana!"

"The $(0) Buster towers has been
damaged! Please help it!"

"The $(0) Buster towers doesn't look
very good! Please help save it!"

"A Buster Tower has been destroyed!
We only have 3 remaining! We still
have leeway! Let's hurry and proceed!"

"Another Buster Tower has been
destroyed! We cannot predict our
current status! Please be careful!"

"Another tower has been busted!
Defend our last towers!"

"All towers have been destroyed.
It's regrettable, but we cannot
continue the battle."

"An ultra-high energy reading is
coming from the Devil Castle!
This is dangerous! Endure it with
all your might!"

"Our forces strength is declining!
If we receive more damage, we will
withdraw!"

"We're getting severely weaker!
It's more than we can stand!
Please protect the towers and reduce
the damage being done!"

"Our combat time is almost done!
If we can destroy the Devil Castle
here, we can grasp victory!"

"Our combat time has almost depleted!
Just a little more, give it everything
we got!"

"The enemy forces are retreating!
The damage we've received is minimum!
And we have seized victory!"

"The Devil Castle has been destroyed!
We have grasped victory!"

"Thank you for your hard work!
Please return."

"Buster towerss have been damaged.
Fighting is hard.
Let's retreat at once."

"All of the towerss have been
destroyed... Since we cannot
fight anymore, let's retreat."

"I see, it cannot be helped...
Please return."
